= Introduction =




= Details =

Three steps are necessary to install project valerie.

  * Copy the e2control bin to your /bin folder.
  Add an autostart entry in your rcS file similar to 
{{{
export BOXSYSTEM="MANUFACTOR=Kathrein;MODEL=UFS910;"
/bin/e2control &
}}}
  _Note: Without the export line e2control will crash!_


  * Replace enimga2 with the patched enigma2 binary.
  Replace the following Python files 
{{{
mytest.py
skin.py
PluginComponent.py
}}}
  Copy 
{{{
DMC_MainMenu.py
DMC_Movies.py
DMC_Series.py
MC_AudioPlayer.py
MediaCenter/
}}}
  into your Python Screens Folder

  * Install the Java PC Application on your PC.
